mean_cn: v.（猪等）作呼噜声，（表示烦恼、反对、疲劳、轻蔑等）发哼声；  n.呼噜声，咕哝
mean_en: (of animals, especially pigs) to make a short, low sound in the throat; (of people) to make a short, low sound in your throat, especially to show that you are in pain, annoyed or not interested; to say something using this sound
sentence: The pig fell asleep and grunted occasionally.
sentence_trans: 这只猪睡着了，偶尔打个呼噜。
